title: Inkscapetober Day 20: Sprout
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 20:** Sprout
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image Peanut.png]]


**Subject:** SCP-173

**Commentary:** Ah yes, if it isn't everyone's favorite SCP ever. But more seriously, I felt that SCP-173, as the first SCP ever, deserves a tribute from me. The comparison between SCP-173's appearance and a peanut has been made quite a lot, so I couldn't resist to copy that into the coat of arms. The peanut here acts as the font from which the rest of the foundation has grown.

**How the prompt fits in:** The peanut, being the original seed of inspiration, has the rest of the foundation sprouted from it.

@@ @@
